name: Magic Mill Pro Food Dehydrator Machine | 7 Stainless Steel Trays | Dryer for Jerky, Dog Treats, Herb, Meat, Beef, Fruit | Keep Warm Function, Digital Timer and Temperature Control, ETL Approved
about_this_item: REAR MOUNTED FAN FOR SUPERIOR HEAT DISTRIBUTION – Dries food evenly, This electric dehydration machine is equipped with a rear-mounted drying fan and air flow circulation technology to ensure even drying, there is no need to rotate the shelves as needed by other brands, monitor the dryer process easily with the transparent door window

DIGITAL THERMOSTAT AND TIMER- AUTOMATIC SHUT OFF WHEN TIMER DONE -- An adjustable temperature and timer ensure you to have your delicious, dehydrated food done to perfect at optimal temperature and exact timing; the Countdown timer will show you when it will be done, once done it will automatically shut off, And you can set the Keep Warm Function to keep the Food warm.

SPACIOUS ADJUSTABLE 7 STAINLESS STEEL TRAYS – INCLUDED FRUIT ROLL TRAYS! Use the trays for regular food and the mesh trays for smaller food such as nuts and herbs, for fruit roll ups use the fruit leather sheet which can also be used for drip trays! you can do a lot in one batch with the Magic Mill dehydration machine, the dehydrator comes with 7 premium stainless steel trays.

EASY TO USE AND CLEAN - DISHWASHER SAFE TRAYS You want to dry Jerky, beef, herbs, vegetables, fruit, granola, fruit leathers, breadcrumbs, and for preserving herbs, flowers, and much more, cleaning is easy all trays and liners are dishwasher safe, and the housing can be easily wiped down with a damp cloth

TOP OF THE LINE SAFETY FEATURES / BPA FREE The Magic Mill Premium Food Dehydrator is Equipped with intelligent Overheat protection, that will activate if the dehydrator overheats. the trays are built with top Quality food-grade Stainless Steel that is BPA Free

title: Exceptional Performance and Versatility!
content: I recently purchased the Magic Mill Pro Food Dehydrator Machine, and it has quickly become an indispensable kitchen appliance. This dehydrator delivers outstanding performance and versatility, making it a top-notch choice for food preservation and preparation.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: First and foremost, the build quality is impressive. The dehydrator is sturdy and well-constructed, with a sleek design that fits nicely on my countertop. The materials used are durable, and it feels like a high-quality, long-lasting appliance.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2024

title: This is so amazing!!
content: The performance of this machine is excellent. It features multiple trays that provide ample space for dehydrating a variety of foods. I’ve used it to make beef jerky, strawberries, pasta, blueberries, and various other goodies for backpacking. The adjustable temperature settings allow me to dry everything with precision, and the consistent heat distribution ensures even drying, which is crucial for achieving perfect results.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: Another great feature is the user-friendly control panel. It’s easy to set the temperature and time, and the digital display is clear and intuitive. The machine operates quietly and efficiently, and the results have been consistently impressive.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2024

title: LOVE IT! Great Capacity, Easy to Use, Excellent Results..now what else can I dehydrate?
content: Cleaning the trays is a breeze, and the machine is easy to maintain. The dehydrator’s ability to retain flavor and nutrients in the food is a huge plus, making it perfect for creating healthy snacks and preserving seasonal produce.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: In summary, the Magic Mill Pro Food Dehydrator Machine is an outstanding investment for anyone interested in food preservation. post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2024

title: Works well
content: I have wanted to have more nutrient dense "raw foods" as snacks. Most you find in the store are so expensive and processed. So, I decided to finally go for it and buy a dehydrator. I shopped in the stores and they were all very plastic and the ones that were stainless steel were huge! Just a massive foot print for something Id like to keep on my kitchen counter. But this was perfect. She is so cute and only about a foot wide. I got the 7 shelf so I knew it would not be taller than the cabinets above it and it is just the right height.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Shipping was great. It arrived just when it said it would.

title: so easy, and works like a charm.  I should have bought one years ago.

I did that.

title: I love it.

Cleanup was a breeze.  This baby will get a whole lot of use in my house.

title: Verified Purchase
content: This whole thing is stainless steel, and the trays, too. I had an all plastic model, and it just felt weird preparing foods in all plastic machine, but this is a game changer. I love that the fans are in the back, which creates even drying time, and if you remember the plastic models, there was a heating element and fan on the bottom, and you had to change the order of your trays. That’s bonkers!! I can never go back. It works well, it’s not silent, but it isn’t obnoxiously loud, it’s easy to clean, and the timer and such is digital. This is the one. Add it to your cart. Cheers!

title: Best dehydrator!
content: I wanted a dehydrator that I can run off-grid using a 600-watt solar generator. I have a Bluetti for my higher-wattage appliances like toaster and kettle but wanted to dedicate a 600-watt Allpowers generator to just dehydration. At 480 watts, the 7100 model runs great without tripping the generator, and on a sunny day I can get a good run without having to plug into the grid at all.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: At first I thought the size was going to be an issue, because it's much smaller (12 x 13 trays) than, say, an Excalibur (14 x 14 trays) or one of the larger dehydrators made by Magic Mill. But I love the size! It tucks neatly onto my countertop, back under the cabinets where it's out of the way, and it is very quiet. It really holds a LOT of food, and considering how evenly it dries, it works better than larger less-good dehydrators I've used do.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I thoroughly researched dehydrators - looking for a good price, a small kitchen footprint, and a proven product.  Narrowed it down to Cosori, Magic Mill, and Excaliber.  So happy with my Magic Mill purchase.  It takes up little counter space, is super quiet, and has 7 tray slots.  I received 7 metal trays, 2 slotted plastic trays, and a lipped plastic tray for fruit leather that I'm using as a drip tray.  I've had great success with beef jerky, dried blueberries, and am drying apples, mangoes, and peaches as I write.  The instruction manual comes with recipes, but if you mistakenly throw it away with the sturdy boxing in which the machine arrives, you can pop on YouTube for time/temp guidance.  Yes, I DID that!  Highly recommend.  It's almost foolproof and all trays are dishwasher friendly.  BTW, I purchased the smallest model; however, Magic Mill has larger sizes to meet your specific needs.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2024

title: Customer service
content: This thing is great for drying evenly, having a lot of room and being easy to clean. However, I can't believe it doesn't have a pause button. The default on it is also way too high for standard use, so if you want to check or shift your food around mid cycle you have to stop the program then redo the whole thing to get it down to a normal temperature. It's not a huge deal but I don't understand why they wouldn't include a pause or have the default be so far above what people will use it for most.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2024

title: Practice makes perfect
content: This is a great product. I did find that it takes a bit of practice to find what works best for different items, but once you get the hang of it, it's fantastic. A very fair price for a product that I will get a lot of use out of for dehydrating my garden herbs, fruits and veggies this year!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: This has been a great upgrade from what I was using before! It’s super quiet! Almost sounds like a refrigerator running instead of a leaf blower, like my last one lol. I bought it before Christmas to be able to make dog treats and it has since done multiple batches of chicken feet, running for 36 hours at 160 degrees each time. I’ve also tried sweet potatoes and currently have a batch of chicken livers going. I haven’t tested temperature consistency but, so far, every batch I’ve made has come out with no problems. A lot of heat does escape through the gaps around the door, but again, I’ve had no issues with my items not getting done. The bottom also puts off quite a bit of heat, so I’ve sat it on a cutting board for now, since I do run it in excess of a day at a high setting. I have no issues setting the temp and time and am overall quite happy with this purchase! Just need it to keep on keepin on lol
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2024

title: Very quiet! And a great dehydrator so far!
content: I never know what to expect buying counter appliances.  This this gives off a soft hum which is exponentially quieter than the vent for the range top cooking stove.  The exterior of the food dehydrator is not hot to the touch.  However, if you open the door early to shift the shelves around, they are hot to the touch, but not like burning yourself on the oven.

title: Works great so Far
content: Much better than my last dehydrator, this current one is super quiet. My air fryer is noisier. Nice and compact size fits under the cupboards on the counter with still room to a stack stuff on top of it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 29, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Great value
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2024
